mapper.select: select * from tb_member m inner join tb_member_detail d on m.mem_no in( select friends_no from tb_friends where mem_no=#{friendsNo}) where m.mem_no=d.mem_no;
mapper.insert: insert into tb_friends( mem_no, friends_no, acc_state )values( #{memNo}, #{friendsNo}, 'R' )
insert into tb_friends( mem_no, friends_no, acc_state )values( #{memNo}, #{friendsNo}, 'A' )
